portfolio.title: PatsJams
portfolio.description: PatsJams is music playlist creating app, built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the Spotify API. Users can search for songs and add them to a playlist. The playlist can then be saved to the user's Spotify account.

portfolio.title: WeatherChecker
portfolio.description: WeatherChecker is a weather app built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and the OpenWeather API. Users can search for a city and get the current weather and a 5-day forecast. The app also uses local storage to save the user's search history.

portfolio.title: The Dave Trivia Experience
portfolio.description: The Dave Trivia Experience is a trivia game built using HTML, CSS, TypeScript, React and the Open Trivia Database API. Users can play a game of trivia and see their score at the end.
